sentences.english: There is a very good restaurant in the Kunlun Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在昆仑饭店有一家好餐馆。

sentences.english: Akazi pluton, which occurs in Western Kunlun in north of Qinghai-Tibet plateau, is the known oldest pluton in this area.
sentences.chinese: 西昆仑山阿卡孜岩体是该区已知的最古老侵入体。

sentences.english: Kunlun Hotel next Friday to attend a meeting.
sentences.chinese: 下星期五你到昆仑饭店去签到参加一个会议。

sentences.english: This essay argues that the name originated from the Wa people, and Goligong is the very Kunlun Mountain in history.
sentences.chinese: 同时认为，高黎贡山就是我国历史上所说的昆仑山。

sentences.english: The Huang-yang-lin antimony deposit is newly discovered and is located in the hinterland of the Xinjiang Kunlun Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 黄羊岭锑矿床是新疆昆仑山腹地新发现的锑矿产地。

sentences.english: Kunlun gas comes into help and will maximally solve the shortage problem.
sentences.chinese: 中石油昆仑燃气将最大程度地解决这部分天然气缺口。

sentences.english: Keriya River is located in south Xinjiang, China.
sentences.chinese: 克里雅河发源于昆仑山脉，位置在新疆的南部。

sentences.english: Polls suggest that this time the Danes would vote in favour.
sentences.chinese: 我爱昆仑调查显示这次丹麦人将投赞成票。

sentences.english: However, if the Kunlun sent to kill over, how should I do?
sentences.chinese: 但是如果真的昆仑派杀过来，我又该怎么办呢？

sentences.english: How much should it cost to the Kunlun Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 打车到昆仑饭店需要多少钱？

sentences.english: Take Exit B for the Kunlun Hotel.
Hope of Mount Everest, areYangtse and Yellow rivers.
The construction of the Karakoram Highway has helped to further trade and communication.

sentences.english: The Sugaite structural belt in west Xinjiang was located at the front of arcuate nappe outliers of the Kunlun Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 苏盖特构造带位于新疆昆仑山弧形推覆体前缘。

sentences.english: Maqu fault is the easternmost segment of the East Kunlun active fault.
sentences.chinese: 玛曲断裂位于东昆仑断裂带的最东段。
